name: Moonstar Bracelet

weaponEffects.title: Altered Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Altered Resonance: Increase ATK by **20%** and altered resistance by **30%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more altered weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Altered Resonance or Altered Reaction effects, with Altered Resonance taking precedence.

advancements: Using any weapon or discharge skill grants **1** elemental crystal, up to **5** crystals. Elemental crystals are lost at a rate of **1** crystal every **6** seconds. Elemental crystals provide a final damage boost equal to **4%** of [(**crystal count** plus **1**)/**2**] and an increased healing effect equal to **6%** of [(**crystal count** plus **1**)/**2**].
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

While Benediction Resonance is not active, when the target's HP is below (**crystal count** plus **2**)%, using **Moonstar Bracelet** can instantly execute the target (doesn't work against Wanderers).
While Benediction Resonance is active, when the target's HP is below (**crystal count** times **2** plus **2**)**%**, using **Moonstar Bracelet** can instantly execute the target (doesn't work against Wanderers).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

Obtain **1** elemental crystal every time Scatter Technique is used. Elemental crystals are lost at a rate of **1** crystal every **20** seconds. When receiving fatal damage, consume **3** elemental crystals to prevent death **1** time and gain damage immunity for a short time. Can be activated **1** time every **25** seconds.
Increase final damage by **7%** of [(**crystal count** plus **3**)/**2**].

abilities.name: Frost Lash
abilities.description: While on the ground, use Lunar Stars to launch 7 consecutive attacks.

abilities.name: Converging Ripples
abilities.description: Tap and hold normal attack to trigger **Converging Ripples** between the second and sixth normal attacks. Become airborne and fire water bombs ahead, consuming endurance. Each hit deals **88.5% ATK + 5** (charged attack), knocking targets back.

abilities.name: Moonrain
abilities.description: While airborne or performing certain actions, tap and hold normal attack to trigger **Moonrain**. Fall from above, dealing **175% ATK + 9** to targets on the ground, suspending them.

abilities.name: Torrential Convergence
abilities.description: While in mid-air, tap and hold normal attack to trigger **Torrential Convergence** between the second and sixth normal attacks. Fire water bombs ahead, consuming endurance. Each hit deals **88.5% ATK + 5** (charged attack), knocking targets back.

abilities.name: Division
abilities.description: While **Benediction Resonance** is active, tap and hold normal attack on the ground to link Fiona to a teammate, granting bonuses to **healing received**, **resistance**, and **ATK**. The link ends under certain conditions.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing target speed. Become immune to hitstun. Passive: Recover HP equal to **150%** of ATK for self and allies when dodging, and remove **8** points of Graying Bite. Gain **50** additional weapon charge while **Benediction Resonance** is active.

abilities.name: Reversal Wave
abilities.description: Roam ahead several times, dealing damage up to **144%** of ATK + **8** to targets in the area.

abilities.name: Dashing Wave
abilities.description: Unleash a water jet, dealing damage up to **81%** of ATK + **4** to targets in the area and suspending them.

abilities.name: Crashing Falls
abilities.description: Tidal Eruption: Deal damage equal to **416% ATK + 22** and strongly suspend targets in the area. Cooldown: **30** seconds. Passive: Scatter - Gain up to **2** out of **6** Scatter Techniques for Moonstar Bracelet.

abilities.name: Hydro Focus
abilities.description: Surging Tides: Deal damage up to **320%** of ATK + **17** to nearby targets, increasing all elemental damage by **6%** for **20** seconds. Cooldown: **14** seconds.

abilities.name: Vortex
abilities.description: Summon watersprouts to pull nearby targets together and deal damage up to **415.4% ATK + 2**. A large watersprout forms, dealing damage equal to **184.6% ATK + 10** to nearby targets. Cooldown: **12** seconds.

abilities.name: Torrential Force
abilities.description: Bath in Torrents: Gain **60** weapon charge per second and increase skill damage by **12%** for **35** seconds. Using Torrential Force counts as using the current weapon's discharge skill. Shimmering Radiance hits reset **Torrential Force's** cooldown. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

abilities.name: Maelstrom
abilities.description:
Encompassing Waves: Gain a final damage boost that increases over time, up to **26%** (maxes out in **10** seconds). This effect does not stack with repeated uses of **Maelstrom** and is lost upon switching weapons.

Cooldown: **30** seconds.

abilities.name: Aqua Shackles
abilities.description: Execute Aqua Prison on the target for **3** seconds, reducing resistance by **8%** for **15** seconds. The resistance-reducing effect is doubled while diving. Cooldown: **15** seconds.

abilities.name: Wellspring
abilities.description:
Arcane Vitality: Gain a (**Max HP/100,000**)% all elemental damage boost, up to **9%**. Gain another **7%** increase to all elemental damage for **20** seconds when your Max HP is over **1,600,000**.

Cooldown: **15** seconds.

abilities.name: Shimmering Radiance
abilities.description: Switching to this weapon removes debuffs and unleashes **Moonstar's Breath**, dealing damage up to **736% ATK + 39** to nearby targets. Gain **damage immunity**, **HP recovery**, and remove **Graying Bite**. Passive: Moonstar - Enhance ATK or resistance while certain resonances are active. **Benediction Resonance** modifies HP recovery and creates Moonshield.

recommendedMatrices.name: Fiona
recommendedMatrices.description: More niche option but Fiona's 4-piece set will increase your damage a lot. Great for benediction to increase all allies' damage.

recommendedMatrices.name: Lyra
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set to increase both damage and healing done by Lunar Stars.

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set for both damage and shatter.

recommendedMatrices.name: Cocoritter
recommendedMatrices.description: Less recommended because Lunar Stars has less continuous healing output than other healing weapons, but could be useful for the ATK boost.

recommendedMatrices.name: Pepper
recommendedMatrices.description: Decent option to build weapon charge while using Lunar Stars.
